title: 07/20/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/20/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys discuss Peyton and Eli Manning's new partnership with ESPN. Will the Manning's broadcast of Monday Night Football be more popular than the standard ESPN one? ESPN Radio's Jon Barry checks in to preview tonight's Buck/Suns game. What should we expect from Chris Paul? And Television Executive Dick Ebersol joins the show and shares stories about the 1996 Olympics in Atlanta. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
